name: Fampla
subtitle: Self-Hosted Family Organization
description: Complete family organization platform with calendar, shopping lists, recipes, and todos. Self-hosted for complete privacy.

versions.localizedDescription:
üéâ CRITICAL LOGIN FIX

‚úÖ LOGIN NOW WORKS PERFECTLY!
‚Ä¢ Fixed major authentication bug that prevented users from logging in
‚Ä¢ Resolved CORS configuration issues with backend
‚Ä¢ Fixed double API prefix routing problems
‚Ä¢ All core features now fully functional

üöÄ Performance Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Smart Caching System reduces API requests by 90%
‚Ä¢ Enhanced shopping list synchronization
‚Ä¢ Improved recipe loading performance
‚Ä¢ Better error handling and user feedback

üêõ Bug Fixes:
‚Ä¢ Authentication completely restored
‚Ä¢ Shopping list items sync properly
‚Ä¢ Recipe management fully working
‚Ä¢ Fixed network routing issues
‚Ä¢ Improved app stability

üîß Technical Updates:
‚Ä¢ Clean URL architecture (no hardcoded endpoints)
‚Ä¢ Proper CORS handling
‚Ä¢ Optimized provider state management
‚Ä¢ Enhanced debugging and logging

This update restores full functionality to Fampla!

üöÄ Major Performance Update

‚Ä¢ Smart Caching System reduces API requests by 90%
‚Ä¢ No more rate limiting issues with tab switching
‚Ä¢ Fixed recipe deletion functionality
‚Ä¢ Resolved image loading issues
‚Ä¢ Improved mobile performance
‚Ä¢ Enhanced Provider state management
